content: in this legal case the viru county court made a final decision after 7 months the details of the case and the parties involved are not mentioned the court ruled that one party is responsible for covering the procedural costs but the exact amount is not specified the court decision is referred to as court dec the case involves a claimant and a defendant whose names are not mentioned the claimant is represented by a legal aid representative the court has resolved to settle the claim and terminate the joint ownership of an apartment property the defendant is obligated to pay the claimant financial compensation for the expenses incurred in acquiring repairing and maintaining the apartment the court also orders the defendant to give consent for a change in ownership entry in the land register the costs of the proceedings will be borne by the parties with the claimants procedural costs being borne by the republic of estonia the resolution will be published publicly the defendant has 15 days to appeal the decision the circumstances of the case involve a marriage between the parties which ended in divorce the claimant seeks the termination of the property partnership and division of joint assets the court has found the claim justified and orders the division of the joint assets with the apartment property becoming the sole ownership of the claimant the court takes into account the expenses incurred by the claimant in relation to the apartment the claimant is responsible for the monthly utility costs and has taken a loan for the repair of the apartment the court deems it unfair to oblige the claimant to pay the defendants share of the money the procedural costs will be borne by the parties in june 2018 a procedural aid decree was issued exempting the claimant from paying half of the state fee for filing a lawsuit the court found this exemption justified and ordered that the procedural costs be borne by the republic of estonia the text is signed digitally by a judge named v j
